name: Devil's Game.
description:
A Stratergy Card game agains the devil himself! Think every move trought, or else you might lose your soul!

made in 2 days (not 3)  as a submition to the Mini jam 69.

music made by SasquaMox.

Ps: wasnt Writen In the tutorial so i add it here, its  Possible to combine cards if they are the same shape, But not to numbers higher than 10, and you can get bonuses for more than 2 cards in a row.
